quick_start_0: Simple AI operates using a command interface, shortcuts and gestures. Commands all begin with `:` (half-width colon).âŒ¨ï¸
quick_start_1: Before starting to use please register as a `user` with command `:user add [username] [email] [password?]`. For example, `:user add john john@example.com ********`. Note: Do not include the brackets in your command.âœ…
quick_start_2: To log in, use the command `:login [username] [password]`.
quick_start_3: If you forgot your password, reset it using the command `:user reset pass [username] [email]`.ğŸ†˜
quick_start_4: To access the documentation and confirm usage, click the dot (â€¢) in the screen corner.ğŸ“„
